Posts.Content: dana14 wrote: I have tried Percocet, Vicodin and Darvocet and all make me nauseous and vomit, even with anti-nauseous medication.  I've lost 10 lbs in 10 days and I am just in pain now, taking Tylenol. Has anyone with similar symptoms tried anything else that works for them? Thanks. Dana  Dx 1/16/2009, ILC, 3cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 1/17 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply

Posts.Title: Reasonable Waiting Time dana14 karendunn36

Posts.Content: dana14 wrote: If you are not diagnosed but worried you might be on to something.  My lump was diagnosed 2 years ago as a cyst though they never did a biopsy on it.  I asked if should get a second opinion and was assured that my local radiology center is excellent and I have nothing to worry about.  Two years later they detected cancer in my other breast yet they still were not worried about the growing cyst. It was not until I went to get a second opinion on my newly diagnosed cancer that my new doctors identified 'cyst' as malignant tumor plus one more malignant tumor.  Also, my old doctor was calling me at home to discourage me from getting a second opinion. The amount of incompetent and dangerous doctors is staggering.   Go to the best and always get a second opinion.     Dx 1/16/2009, ILC, 3cm, Stage IIB, Grade 2, 1/17 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My Horror Story dana14 Patwiley

Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2010 09:52AM dana14 wrote: Your story is even worse than mine.  My doctor was an incompetent and careless fool.  Your son's doctor willfully and with full awareness chose wrong treatment path causing pain and suffering.
Posts.Title: My Horror Story dana14 Patwiley

Posts.Content: Mar 29, 2010 11:50AM dana14 wrote: If your husband becomes abusive or threatening and you fear for your safety you can file a restraining order with the police.  He will not be allowed in the house any more.  He will have to pay child support, mortgage, house related expenses and if you were not working, alimony as well.  You don't even need a lawyer if you cannot afford one but it is better to have one, even if you have to go into debt temporarily.   It's very hard to make a first move but you deserve to live in peace.
Posts.Title: Spouse that just doesn't care my3sonz cancersuks

And, is there anything you are doing beyond taking prescription medications that helps you fight this terrible disease and makes you better.
